author: jgm
content:
Builders can charge for their services.  The way the do it is as follows:
  - the builder sets the fee recipient for the block being built to an address they control
  - the builder puts together a set of transactions
  - the last transaction in the block involves a payment from the address they set as the fee recipient to the address provided by the proposer
  - the difference between the ETH in from the block and the ETH out in the last transaction in the block is the builder payment
